keyMoments.title: Oars Revealed as Moria's Ultimate Zombie
keyMoments.description: Moria unveils Oars' massive 67-meter tall corpse in the freezer, explaining his history as an ancient giant who built a criminal nation 500 years ago and earned the title 'Continent-Puller'.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Oars establishes him as the primary physical threat of the Thriller Bark arc and demonstrates the scale of Moria's ambitions.

keyMoments.title: Oars Resurrected with Luffy's Shadow
keyMoments.description: Moria successfully implants Luffy's stolen shadow into Oars' corpse using the Kage Kage no Mi, bringing the ancient giant back to life as Special Zombie #900.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the most powerful zombie in Moria's army by combining Oars' immense size and strength with Luffy's abilities and personality.

keyMoments.title: Oars Awakens with Luffy's Personality
keyMoments.description: Upon awakening, Oars immediately displays Luffy's personality by shouting for meat and exhibiting his carefree, food-obsessed nature.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that shadows carry the personality and memories of their original owners, making Oars both powerful and difficult to control.

statusHistory.note: Died approximately 500 years ago in the Land of Ice from exposure and frostbite
Resurrected as Special Zombie #900 with Luffy's shadow

abilities.description: As an ancient giant and the Continent-Puller, Oars possesses tremendous physical strength matching his massive size.
Through Luffy's shadow, Oars can use stretching abilities similar to the Gomu Gomu no Mi, combined with his giant size.

relationships.description: Oars is controlled by Moria as his ultimate zombie weapon, though he displays Luffy's independent personality which may make him difficult to control.

evolutionMoments.description: Moria resurrects Oars with Luffy's shadow to create his most powerful zombie.

relationships.description: Oars contains Luffy's stolen shadow, giving him Luffy's personality traits, memories, and fighting abilities.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy's shadow is implanted into Oars' corpse, connecting them.

reveals.information: Oars was an ancient giant who lived over 500 years ago, known as the 'Continent-Puller' who built a criminal nation
Died in the Land of Ice from exposure and frostbite while wearing only a loincloth
Resurrected as a zombie with Luffy's shadow, gaining his personality and abilities

keyMoments.title: Brook Reveals Zombie Weakness
keyMoments.description: Brook explains to Franky and Robin that salt can purify zombies because shadows are taken via Devil Fruit powers, and Devil Fruit users are weakened by seawater.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial tactical information that will help the Straw Hats fight against Moria's zombie army.
keyMoments.quote: Even without the shadow, the body still lives. Shadows are taken via Devil Fruit powers, and Devil Fruit users are weakened by seawater - that's why ordinary salt destroys zombies.

keyMoments.title: Brook Decides to Confront Ryuma
keyMoments.description: Brook parts ways with Franky and Robin, declaring he will no longer run and must defeat Ryuma to reclaim his shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Brook's character development and determination to achieve his goal despite knowing Ryuma is stronger.
keyMoments.quote: I won't run any longer. I must defeat the zombie who holds possession of my shadow - Ryuma.

relationships.description: Brook seeks to defeat the zombie Ryuma who possesses his shadow. They share the same fighting techniques, but Ryuma has the advantage of a stronger body.

evolutionMoments.description: Brook declares his intention to confront Ryuma and reclaim his shadow.

reveals.information: Brook knows that salt can purify zombies because it counters Devil Fruit powers
Brook demonstrates growth by choosing to face his fears and confront Ryuma rather than running

keyMoments.title: Moria Reveals Oars
keyMoments.description: Moria unveils his ultimate zombie weapon - the massive ancient giant Oars - to his subordinates in the freezer.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the culmination of Moria's plans and his ultimate weapon for achieving his ambitions.
keyMoments.quote: This is the great conqueror known as Oars - the Continent-Puller who built a nation of criminals 500 years ago!

keyMoments.title: Moria's Defeat by Kaido Revealed
keyMoments.description: Moria reveals that he was defeated by Kaido, one of the Four Emperors, in the New World, which motivates his creation of a zombie army for revenge.
keyMoments.significance: First significant mention of Kaido in the series and explains Moria's motivations and backstory.
keyMoments.quote: I would not have lost to Kaido in the New World if I had a strong enough zombie. I'll become King of the Pirates with my zombie army and get my revenge on Kaido!

keyMoments.title: Moria Resurrects Oars
keyMoments.description: Moria successfully uses his Kage Kage no Mi power to implant Luffy's shadow into Oars, bringing the ancient giant to life.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the most powerful zombie in Moria's arsenal and the primary physical threat for the arc's climax.

bounties.reason: Former bounty before becoming a Warlord

relationships.description: Kaido defeated Moria in the New World, destroying his original crew and dreams. Moria seeks revenge through his zombie army.

evolutionMoments.description: Moria reveals his past defeat by Kaido and his desire for revenge.

relationships.description: Moria created and controls Oars as his ultimate zombie weapon.

evolutionMoments.description: Moria resurrects Oars with Luffy's shadow.

reveals.information: Was defeated by Kaido in the New World, which destroyed his original crew
Seeks revenge against Kaido and plans to become Pirate King with his zombie army
Uses Kage Kage no Mi to implant Luffy's shadow into Oars

keyMoments.title: Hogback's Decade of Work on Oars
keyMoments.description: Hogback reveals he has spent the past 10 years restoring and preserving Oars' corpse since meeting Moria.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the long-term planning and dedication involved in preparing Moria's ultimate zombie.
keyMoments.quote: I've been working on restoring and preserving Oars' corpse since I met you 10 years ago.

reveals.information: Has been working with Moria for at least 10 years on the Oars project
